title: Hotel California
why: This song was a classic that Thai's father played during every roadtrip, family gathering, and karaoke session. Thai was too young to appreciate what he had heard at the time, but now that he's matured, he realizes that his father has fire music tastes.

title: That Thing You Do!
why: This catchy beat is one that Thai rediscovered after hearing time and time again from his little brother, Minh. Make sure you listen long enough for the guitar solo; it'll have you 'wonder' if you've been living under a rock this whole time.
